channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole at edge of road, 16th March
item.description:
Heading towards Withington, close to the junction for Kim Bailey racing stables
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Withington, Cotswold

item.title: All street lights out in this section of the road, 16th March
item.description:
The street lights either side of the traffic lights at the Highfield Business park crossroads are off.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Elmstone Hardwicke, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole about dinnerplate in size in right turning lane before zoons court roundabout., 16th March
item.description:
In location identified in right turning lane before entering on to zoons court roundabout that is a deep pothole that shakes the car hard if hit. Needs immediate rectification as not visible at night as road lights don't cover it. Will break suspensions and wheels.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud on road sign needs to be removed at junction of Park Lane and road to Cleeve Commonon road, 16th March
item.description:
I assume this is a sign belonging to Gloucestershire Highways, I have reported this on a number of times, starting before Christmas, but sign has not been removed. Please do so ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Restricted byway sign sawn off, 16th March
item.description:
Just short of drive to Whitehall Farm, on No Through Road to Cleeve Common.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large long pothoyle opposite 1 Park Lane, 16th March
item.description:
I have reported this pothole on numerous occasions, but nothing has been done. It is getting significantly larger and deeper.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Lane, Sevenhampton, Cotswold

item.title: Large pothole, 16th March
item.description:
100 yds approx up Park Lane from Brockhampton Park crossroads. Left side of road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Lane, Sevenhampton, Cotswold

item.title: Street light out - street in complete darkness., 16th March
item.description:
Outside approx house 30 Fairhaven Road Street is in complete darkness - not very safe
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Fairhaven Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: The road is covered in pot holes and is missing a lot of tarmac. This road will damage many cars. It has been like this for months., 16th March
item.description:
On Priors Road, the full length between Bouncers Lane and Prestbury Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water coming from drain cover, 16th March
item.description:
Of going from Deer Park, Girlguiding and heading towards the Green Dragon put, the drain is on the opposite side of the road on the Girlguiding center just as you go down the hill. The drain can be found on the verge. I've known the issue to be there all year. However, I am lead to believe it has been going on longer than that.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowley Lane, Cowley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo bin needs emptying, 16th March
item.description:
Please can you arrange for the dog poo bin to be emptied. Thank you!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Lane, Prestbury, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole outside No 6 Hamilton Street, 16th March
item.description:
As above. Previously reported (enquiry no:22042399) end of February. Hole has become much larger and deeper and is now considered dangerous especially to cyclists. All markings around it have disappeared due to the considerable erosion. Would appreciate urgent action. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Brookway Drive, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very big pothole on the Lansdown Road, just before the Shell garage, 16th March
item.description:
Lansdown Road (A40) travelling from town towards Shell petrol station. Just after turning with Shelburne Road the A40 splits into 3 lanes. The outer lane (to trun right) has a very large pothole, so big you can see pipes at the bottom.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 12 millham road over a metre in length., 16th March
item.description:
I reported this at the beginning of March, it was 2 holes now it is 1 large deep hole (over a metre) stones are flicking out onto the path and onto our drive where our vehicles are parked and landing on them, also our neighbours. Itâ€™s filled with water so people are going down it and the noise is really bad.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3,5, Millham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes, 16th March
item.description:
Lots of deep wide pot holes on this road, need fixing. There hard to see in the dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 297, Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic Lights have been faulty since road resurfacing work., 16th March
item.description:
Traffic light system appears to think there is always vehicles waiting to turn right into Greenways. This is causing unnecessary congestion on Hucclecote road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnwood Road, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Traffic Lights faulty since road resurfacing work., 16th March
item.description:
Traffic lights appear to think there are vehicles waiting to turn into Hucclecote road from Folland Avenue even when there are none. This is causing unnecessary congestion on Hucclecote Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Folland Avenue, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Faulty Traffic Lights since road resurfacing work, 16th March
item.description:
Traffic lights on cross roads with Hucclecote road and Churchdown Lane have been faulty since road resurfacing work has been carried out. Traffic moving from Hucclecote to Brockworth is experiencing long delays, it is as though vehicles are not being detected in this direction, thereby deferring to the opposite flow.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carisbrooke Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Exposed grated drain cover, with sharp corner exposed to on coming traffic. This is on both a bus route and a road used heavily by parents dropping junior children off for school. Unless urgently repaired it is going to cause an accident and in my opinion is a major Health and Safety issue, 16th March
item.description:
The exposed drain cover is in Quat Goose Road on the opposite side of the road to the Seasons entrance

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin overflowing, 16th March
item.description:
Bin, as usual, has not been emptied for over 10 days. Along with the bin near Moorend Road which is also over-full. Kindly tell Ubico to get off their backsides and do the job for which they are paid

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): King William Drive, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
